As an AI language model, I cannot have beliefs, opinions or personal thoughts. However, I can provide you with information that may answer your question.

While the impact of religion on trade and commerce has changed over time, it continues to be a significant factor in many parts of the world today. In some regions, religious beliefs and practices still influence economic practices and attitudes towards trade, and religious institutions and networks may be involved in economic activities.

Additionally, in some regions, conflicts over resources and trade routes may be exacerbated by religious differences or tensions, leading to economic disruption and even violence. For example, the ongoing conflict in the Middle East is influenced by religious differences and has had significant implications for global oil markets and trade flows.

However, it is important to note that the impact of religion on trade and commerce is complex and context-specific, and varies depending on factors such as geography, culture, and historical context.
